section1.desc: Smart Order System for Your Business

section2.desc1: SansOrder is a technology-based system consisting of an Ordering System and a Cashier System, which can help Entrepreneur to build and develop their business.
section2.desc2: SansOrder is designed to make it easier for Customers in terms of Orders and Payments that can be made directly at the table.

desc3.title: SansOrder does not only focus on the Ordering System but also includes the Cashier System, where the system also makes it easier for Entrepreneur to:
desc3.list:
Controlling Inventory
Stock Management
HPP
Revenue trends
Best selling product trends

section3.payment_desc: Simplify the shopping experience for your Customers by ordering and paying without ever leaving the table.

invoice.title: Invoice & E-Receipt
invoice.desc: Send invoices and e-receipts automatically to your Customers.
